summary: IT Support Technician/Specialist with 20+ years of experience delivering customer-focused IT support, hardware/software maintenance, and helpdesk operations. Trained in Networking (Cisco and Microsoft) at Southern Crescent Technical College; pursuing Network Management certification at Western Governors University. Skilled at explaining complex technical concepts to users, managing Cisco switches, VOIP installs, remote desktop tools, and class management software; strong focus on professionalism, problem-solving, and service quality.

experience.title: I.T. Support Technician/Specialist
experience.description: Respond to tickets via helpdesk; support Faculty and Staff with computer and networking problems; installed VOIP phones; RiseVision software for signage; oversaw installation procedures and currently supervise iTALC class management software; worked with Kaseya management system for remote desktop operations and automated workstation updates; involved in inventory control; maintained professional, knowledgeable interactions with users; ensured problem resolution and user satisfaction.

experience.title: Children's Program Developer/Operations Manager
experience.description: Oversaw day-to-day operations; sold memberships and retail goods; upgraded packages; taught martial arts classes and designed curriculum; resolved issues between customers and management; communicated one-on-one with customers; increased sales revenue and membership count.

experience.title: Instructor/Owner
experience.description: Oversaw daily operations; sold memberships and retail goods; designed curriculum; taught martial arts to children and adults; resolved customer-management issues; contributed to business sale to a new owner.

experience.title: Technical Support
experience.description: Solved problems over the phone for a software package used to build picture frames; addressed computer and physical design issues; developed effective phone communication and customer service skills.

education.degree: Associates of Applied Technology: Networking Cisco and Microsoft
